query:
SELECT 
            a.id as coauthor_id,
            a.full_name as coauthor_name,
            cp.collaboration_count
        FROM coauthor_pairs cp
        JOIN authors a ON (
            CASE 
                WHEN cp.author1_id = $1 THEN cp.author2_id
                ELSE cp.author1_id
            END = a.id
        )
        WHERE cp.author1_id = $1 OR cp.author2_id = $1
        ORDER BY cp.collaboration_count DESC, a.full_name
        LIMIT 20
